bill_title: establish a maximum rate of interest on debt arising out of medical services.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to establish a maximum rate of interest on debt arising out of medical services. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That the code be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: The maximum interest rate payable on any debt arising out of medical services performed in the state shall be no more than the Category A rate of interest as established by § 54-3-16. This section applies to any debt incurred on or after July 1, 2017. Section 2. That the code be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: In the case of an action for debt arising out of medical services performed in the state, prejudgment and postjudgment interest shall be payable at no more than the Category A rate of interest as established by § 54-3-16. The awarding of interest in such cases is discretionary. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.161 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
